answers.answer: At five months i was tired i barely felt kicks nothing changed much wait till six months
Drink alot of water to eat less you will be thirsty this is the time to watch ur intake so u wont get gd or preeclampsia

I'm 5 months next week and have been feeling baby kick since week 13 (2nd baby) I've been suffering severe morning sickness since week 5 and have lost 10kg. I'm lucky if I get to eat more than twice a day. Boobs have grown 2-3 cup sizes already! Like you, I've been so tired but having a 3 year old son doesn't give me much time to rest lol this pregnancy has been horrible! Another symptom is severe constipation! (No bowel movement in 2 weeks)

I had severe sickness in the beginning and couldn't eat anything even crackers made me sick. I drink tons of water throughout the day . I sleep like crazy . the kicks feels like little pokings in my stomach its great but weird too lol. I still have constipation from time to time .

Im at my 5 month mark and felt baby move a few times like butterflys ... they havent been constant just every so often but apparently when u hit 6 months ull feel it every day .. my symtoms have been getting sick every morning which I dont mind considering I suffered from hyperemes gravidarum till 13 weeks..im hungry constantly cant seem to stop eating sweets and chocolate .. heartburn is awful and a couple of headaches and im tiered after about 2 hpurs of being awake and I get like 11 hours of sleep a night .. but hey its all worth it in the end .. cant wait to meet my little girl

question: Anyone at their 5th month yet... Have u felt the baby kick . kinda feels like a poke from the inside lol. How do you feel.  I'm exhausted still all the time but I'm eating everything within two hrs I'm empty and eating again. What your symptoms and ur pregnancy like . I'm curious to know if anyone else feels the same way I do lol
title: 5th month yet ?
